name: Victor Escorcia
body:
Welcome to my website!!! I am a Colombian engineer interested on computer vision. I am a PhD student at [KAUST](http://www.kaust.edu.sa/) (Saudi Arabia) advised by [Prof. Bernard Ghanem](http://www.bernardghanem.com/). I am working on the development of algorithms based on machine learning to understand the enormous amount of visual information.

I received my Master degree in Electronics from [Universidad del Norte](http://www.uninorte.edu.co) in 2014, under the supervision of [Prof. Juan Carlos Niebles](http://www.niebles.net).

### Publications
* **On the Relationship between Visual Attributes and Convolutional Networks**
Victor Escorcia, Juan Carlos Niebles, Bernard Ghanem. CVPR, June 2015. [Paper (Preliminar version)](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B0ZXjo_p8lHBbFF3a21qWHhPYU0&authuser=0)

* **ActivityNet: A Large-Scale Video Benchmark for Human Activity Understanding**
Fabian Caba Heilbron, Victor Escorcia, Bernard Ghanem, Juan Niebles. CVPR, June 2015.

* **Spatio-Temporal Human-Object Interactions for Action Recognition in Videos**
Victor Escorcia and Juan Carlos Niebles. HACI 2013, ICCV Workshop. 2013. [Paper](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B0ZXjo_p8lHBSUpOTGs3ZUVtV1k&authuser=0), [Project page](http://www.niebles.net/iccvw13)

* **Automated Vision-based Recognition of Construction Worker Actions for Building Interior Construction Operations Using RGBD Cameras**
